hadiths.text: Abu Atiyyah narrated that :a man among them said: "Malik bin Al-Huwairith came to us in our Musalla to narrate. One day when it was time for Salat, we told him to go ahead (to lead the prayer). He said: 'Let one of you go forward, until I narrate to you why I would not go forward (to lead prayer): I heard Allah's Messenger saying: "Whoever visits a people, then he does not lead them, but a man among them leads them

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِيمَنْ زَارَ قَوْمًا لاَ يُصَلِّي بِهِمْ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related [About] 'Whoever Visits A People, He Does Not Lead Them In Salat'
